237
242void LevelSetObject::setKernel(LevelSetKernel *kernel) {
243 // Set kernel
244 m_kernel = kernel;
245
246 // Enable output
247 for ( const auto &fieldEntry : m_enabledOutputFields ) {
248 enableVTKOutput( fieldEntry.first, true ) ;
249 }
250
251 // Create cell cache collection
252 PiercedVector<Cell, long> *cacheKernel = &(m_kernel->getMesh()->getCells());
253 m_cellCacheCollection = std::unique_ptr<CellCacheCollection>(new CellCacheCollection(cacheKernel));
254
255 // Evaluate data
256 evaluate();
257}
258
263LevelSetKernel * LevelSetObject::getKernel() {
264 return m_kernel;
265}
266
271const LevelSetKernel * LevelSetObject::getKernel() const {
272 return m_kernel;
273}
274
279int LevelSetObject::getId( ) const {
280 return m_id ;
281}
282
288bool LevelSetObject::isPrimary( ) const {
289 return true;
290}
291
295void LevelSetObject::evaluate()
296{
297 // Get fields with empty caches
298 std::vector<LevelSetField> fillableFields;
299 for (std::size_t fieldIndex = 0; fieldIndex < static_cast<std::size_t>(LevelSetField::COUNT); ++fieldIndex) {
300 LevelSetField field = static_cast<LevelSetField>(fieldIndex);
301
302 LevelSetCacheMode fieldCacheMode = getFieldCellCacheMode(field);
303 if (fieldCacheMode == LevelSetCacheMode::NONE) {
304 continue;
305 }
306
307 std::size_t fieldCacheId = getFieldCellCacheId(field);
308 if (fieldCacheId != CellCacheCollection::NULL_CACHE_ID) {
309 continue;
310 }
311
312 fillableFields.push_back(field);
313 }
314
315 // Create field cell caches
316 for (LevelSetField field : fillableFields) {
317 createFieldCellCache(field);
318 }
319
320 // Evaluate narrow band data
321 evaluateCellNarrowBandData();
322
323 // Fill field cell caches inside the narrow band
324 fillFieldCellCaches(LevelSetZone::NARROW_BAND, fillableFields);
325
326 // Evaluate bulk data
327 evaluateCellBulkData();
328
329 // Fill field cell caches inside the bulk
330 fillFieldCellCaches(LevelSetZone::BULK, fillableFields);
331}
332
337void LevelSetObject::update( const std::vector<adaption::Info> &adaptionData )
338{
339 // Get fields with non-empty caches
340 std::vector<LevelSetField> fillableFields;
341 for (std::size_t fieldIndex = 0; fieldIndex < static_cast<std::size_t>(LevelSetField::COUNT); ++fieldIndex) {
342 LevelSetField field = static_cast<LevelSetField>(fieldIndex);
343
344 LevelSetCacheMode fieldCacheMode = getFieldCellCacheMode(field);
345 if (fieldCacheMode == LevelSetCacheMode::NONE) {
346 continue;
347 }
348
349 std::size_t fieldCacheId = getFieldCellCacheId(field);
350 if (fieldCacheId == CellCacheCollection::NULL_CACHE_ID) {
351 continue;
352 }
353
354 fillableFields.push_back(field);
355 }
356
357 // Update cell caches
358 adaptCellCaches(adaptionData);
359
360 // Evaluate narrow band data
361 updateCellNarrowBandData(adaptionData);
362
363 // Fill field cell caches inside the narrow band
364 fillFieldCellCaches(LevelSetZone::NARROW_BAND, fillableFields, adaptionData);
365
366 // Evaluate bulk data
367 updateCellBulkData(adaptionData);
368
369 // Fill field cell caches inside the bulk
370 fillFieldCellCaches(LevelSetZone::BULK, fillableFields, adaptionData);
371}
372
384double LevelSetObject::getNarrowBandSize() const
385{
386 return m_narrowBandSize;
387}
388
400void LevelSetObject::setNarrowBandSize(double size)
401{
402 // Early return if size doesn't need to be updated
403 if (m_narrowBandSize == size) {
404 return;
405 }
406
407 // Destroy current data
408 //
409 // Current information need to be destroyed (not just cleared) because the updated narrow
410 // band size may require different storage types.
411 if (getKernel()) {
412 destroyCellNarrowBandData();
413 destroyCellBulkData();
414
415 for (std::size_t fieldIndex = 0; fieldIndex < static_cast<std::size_t>(LevelSetField::COUNT); ++fieldIndex) {
416 LevelSetField field = static_cast<LevelSetField>(fieldIndex);
417 LevelSetCacheMode fieldCacheMode = getFieldCellCacheMode(field);
418
419 bool destroyFieldCache = true;
420 if (fieldCacheMode == LevelSetCacheMode::NONE) {
421 destroyFieldCache = false;
422 } else if (fieldCacheMode == LevelSetCacheMode::FULL && getCellBulkEvaluationMode() == LevelSetBulkEvaluationMode::EXACT) {
423 destroyFieldCache = false;
424 }
425
426 if (destroyFieldCache) {
427 destroyFieldCellCache(field);
428 }
429 }
430 }
431
432 // Set the narrow band size
433 m_narrowBandSize = size;
434
435 // Evaluate updated information
436 if (getKernel()) {
437 evaluate();
438 }
439}
440
444void LevelSetObject::evaluateCellNarrowBandData()
445{
446 // Identify cells locations
447 if (m_narrowBandSize != LEVELSET_NARROW_BAND_UNLIMITED) {
448 createCellLocationCache();
449 fillCellLocationCache();
450 }
451}
452
458void LevelSetObject::updateCellNarrowBandData( const std::vector<adaption::Info> &adaptionData )
459{
460 // Update cells locations
461 if (m_narrowBandSize != LEVELSET_NARROW_BAND_UNLIMITED) {
462 fillCellLocationCache(adaptionData);
463 }
464}
465
469void LevelSetObject::destroyCellNarrowBandData( )
470{
471 // Identify cells inside the narrow band
472 if (m_narrowBandSize != LEVELSET_NARROW_BAND_UNLIMITED) {
473 destroyCellLocationCache();
474 }
475}
476
483LevelSetCellLocation LevelSetObject::getCellLocation(long id) const
484{
485 // Early return if the object is empty
486 if (empty()) {
487 return LevelSetCellLocation::BULK;
488 }
489
490 // Early return if the narrow band is unlimited
491 if (m_narrowBandSize == LEVELSET_NARROW_BAND_UNLIMITED) {
492 return LevelSetCellLocation::NARROW_BAND_UNDEFINED;
493 }
494
495 // Early return if the narrow band cells has not been identified yet
496 if (m_cellLocationCacheId == CellCacheCollection::NULL_CACHE_ID) {
497 return LevelSetCellLocation::UNKNOWN;
498 }
499
500 // Get the location from the cache
501 CellCacheCollection::ValueCache<char> *locationCache = getCellCache<char>(m_cellLocationCacheId);
502 CellCacheCollection::ValueCache<char>::Entry locationCacheEntry = locationCache->findEntry(id);
503
504 if (locationCacheEntry.isValid()) {
505 return static_cast<LevelSetCellLocation>(*locationCacheEntry);
506 } else {
507 return LevelSetCellLocation::UNKNOWN;
508 }
509}
510
517LevelSetZone LevelSetObject::getCellZone(long id) const
518{
519 LevelSetCellLocation cellLocation = getCellLocation(id);
520 switch (cellLocation) {
521
522 case LevelSetCellLocation::BULK:
523 return LevelSetZone::BULK;
524
525 case LevelSetCellLocation::NARROW_BAND_DISTANCE:
526 case LevelSetCellLocation::NARROW_BAND_INTERSECTED:
527 case LevelSetCellLocation::NARROW_BAND_NEIGHBOUR:
528 case LevelSetCellLocation::NARROW_BAND_UNDEFINED:
529 return LevelSetZone::NARROW_BAND;
530
531 case LevelSetCellLocation::UNKNOWN:
532 throw std::runtime_error("Cell location identification has not been performed!");
533
534 default:
535 throw std::runtime_error("Unable to identify cell zone!");
536
537 }
538}
539
550void LevelSetObject::fillCellLocationCache()
551{
552 // Mesh information
553 const VolumeKernel &mesh = *(m_kernel->getMesh()) ;
554
555 // Get the ids associated with internal cells
556 std::vector<long> internalCellIds;
557 if (const VolCartesian *cartesianMesh = dynamic_cast<const VolCartesian *>(&mesh)) {
558 long nCells = cartesianMesh->getCellCount();
559 internalCellIds.resize(nCells);
560 std::iota(internalCellIds.begin(), internalCellIds.end(), 0);
561 } else {
562 long nCells = mesh.getCellCount();
563 VolumeKernel::CellConstIterator internalCellsBegin = mesh.internalCellConstBegin();
564 VolumeKernel::CellConstIterator internalCellsEnd = mesh.internalCellConstEnd();
565
566 internalCellIds.reserve(nCells);
567 for (VolumeKernel::CellConstIterator cellItr = internalCellsBegin; cellItr != internalCellsEnd; ++cellItr) {
568 long cellId = cellItr.getId();
569 internalCellIds.push_back(cellId);
570 }
571 }
572
573 // Get cell location cache
574 CellCacheCollection::ValueCache<char> *locationCache = getCellCache<char>(m_cellLocationCacheId);
575
576 // Clear cell location cache
577 clearCellCache(m_cellLocationCacheId, false);
578
579 // Assign an unknown location to the internal cells.
580 for (long cellId : internalCellIds) {
581 locationCache->insertEntry(cellId, static_cast<char>(LevelSetCellLocation::UNKNOWN));
582 }
583
584 // Identify internal cells that are geometrically inside the narrow band
585 //
586 // A cell is geometrically inside the narrow band if its distance from the surface is smaller
587 // than the narrow band side or if it intersects the surface.
588 //
589 // Cells that intersect the zero-levelset iso-surface need to be identified because they will
590 // be further processed for finding which of their neighbour is inside the narrow band.
591 std::vector<long> intersectedCellIds;
592 if (!empty()) {
593 for (long cellId : internalCellIds) {
594 // Fill location cache for cells geometrically inside the narrow band
595 LevelSetCellLocation cellLocation = fillCellGeometricNarrowBandLocationCache(cellId);
596
597 // Track intersected cells
598 if (cellLocation == LevelSetCellLocation::NARROW_BAND_INTERSECTED) {
599 intersectedCellIds.push_back(cellId);
600 }
601 }
602 }
603
604 // Identify face neighbours of cells that intersect the surface
605 for (long cellId : intersectedCellIds) {
606 auto neighProcessor = [this, &locationCache](long neighId, int layer) {
607 BITPIT_UNUSED(layer);
608
609 // Skip neighbours whose region have already been identified
610 if (getCellLocation(neighId) != LevelSetCellLocation::UNKNOWN) {
611 return false;
612 }
613
614 // The neighbour is inside the narrow band
615 locationCache->insertEntry(neighId, static_cast<char>(LevelSetCellLocation::NARROW_BAND_NEIGHBOUR));
616
617 // Continue processing the other neighbours
618 return false;
619 };
620
621 mesh.processCellFaceNeighbours(cellId, 1, neighProcessor);
622 }
623
624 // Cells whose location is still unknown are in the bulk
625 for (long cellId : internalCellIds) {
626 CellCacheCollection::ValueCache<char>::Entry locationCacheEntry = locationCache->findEntry(cellId);
627 assert(locationCacheEntry.isValid());
628 if (static_cast<LevelSetCellLocation>(*locationCacheEntry) == LevelSetCellLocation::UNKNOWN) {
629 locationCache->insertEntry(cellId, static_cast<char>(LevelSetCellLocation::BULK));
630 }
631 }
632
633#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
634 // Exchange ghost data
635 if (mesh.isPartitioned()) {
636 std::unique_ptr<DataCommunicator> dataCommunicator = m_kernel->createDataCommunicator();
637 startCellCacheExchange(mesh.getGhostCellExchangeSources(), m_cellLocationCacheId, dataCommunicator.get());
638 completeCellCacheExchange(mesh.getGhostCellExchangeTargets(), m_cellLocationCacheId, dataCommunicator.get());
639 }
640#endif
641}
642
655void LevelSetObject::fillCellLocationCache(const std::vector<adaption::Info> &adaptionData)
656{
657 // Mesh information
658 const VolumeKernel &mesh = *(m_kernel->getMesh()) ;
659
660 // Get cell location cache
661 CellCacheCollection::ValueCache<char> *locationCache = getCellCache<char>(m_cellLocationCacheId);
662
663 // Initialize cells updated by the mesh adaption
664 std::unordered_set<long> unknownZoneCellIds;
665 for (const adaption::Info &adaptionInfo : adaptionData) {
666 if (adaptionInfo.entity != adaption::Entity::ENTITY_CELL) {
667 continue;
668 }
669
670 // Skip received cells when the cache is non-volatile
671 //
672 // If the cache is non-volatile, data on exchanged cells has been communicated during
673 // cache adaption.
674 if (adaptionInfo.type == adaption::Type::TYPE_PARTITION_RECV && !locationCache->isVolatile()) {
675 continue;
676 }
677
678 // Add current cells to the process list
679 for (long cellId : adaptionInfo.current) {
680
681 // Assign an unknown location to the newly created cells
682 locationCache->insertEntry(cellId, static_cast<char>(LevelSetCellLocation::UNKNOWN));
683
684 // Add internal cells to the process list
685 bool isCellProcessable = true;
686#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
687 if (mesh.isPartitioned()) {
688 VolumeKernel::CellConstIterator cellItr = mesh.getCellConstIterator(cellId);
689 isCellProcessable = cellItr->isInterior();
690 }
691#endif
692
693 if (isCellProcessable) {
694 unknownZoneCellIds.insert(cellId);
695 }
696 }
697 }
698
699 // Identify internal cells that are geometrically inside the narrow band
700 //
701 // A cell is geometrically inside the narrow band if its distance from the surface is smaller
702 // than the narrow band side or if it intersects the surface.
703 //
704 // Cells that intersect the surface are identified, because they will be further processed for
705 // finding which of their neighbours is inside the narrow band.
706 std::unordered_set<long> intersectedCellIds;
707 if (!empty()) {
708 auto cellIdItr = unknownZoneCellIds.begin();
709 while (cellIdItr != unknownZoneCellIds.end()) {
710 long cellId = *cellIdItr;
711
712 // Fill location cache for cells geometrically inside the narrow band
713 LevelSetCellLocation cellLocation = fillCellGeometricNarrowBandLocationCache(cellId);
714
715 // Track intersected cells
716 if (cellLocation == LevelSetCellLocation::NARROW_BAND_INTERSECTED) {
717 intersectedCellIds.insert(cellId);
718 }
719
720 // Remove from the list cell whose region has been identified
721 if (cellLocation != LevelSetCellLocation::UNKNOWN) {
722 cellIdItr = unknownZoneCellIds.erase(cellIdItr);
723 } else {
724 ++cellIdItr;
725 }
726 }
727 }
728
729#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
730 // Exchange ghost data
731 if (mesh.isPartitioned()) {
732 std::unique_ptr<DataCommunicator> dataCommunicator = m_kernel->createDataCommunicator();
733 startCellCacheExchange(mesh.getGhostCellExchangeSources(), m_cellLocationCacheId, dataCommunicator.get());
734 completeCellCacheExchange(mesh.getGhostCellExchangeTargets(), m_cellLocationCacheId, dataCommunicator.get());
735 }
736#endif
737
738 // Track intersected neighbours of cells whose location was not yet identified
739 //
740 // We need to identified cells that are the narrow band because of a neighbour that was
741 // not affected by the mesh update.
742 if (!empty()) {
743 for (long cellId : unknownZoneCellIds) {
744 // Process cells whose location has not been identified
745 //
746 // For cells whose location has not been identified, the neighbours that intersect
747 // the surface need to be tracked.
748 auto neighProcessor = [this, &intersectedCellIds](long neighId, int layer) {
749 BITPIT_UNUSED(layer);
750
751 // Skip neighbours that are aready identified as intersected
752 if (intersectedCellIds.count(neighId) > 0) {
753 return false;
754 }
755
756 // Skip neighbours that doesn't intersect the surface
757 LevelSetCellLocation neighLocation = getCellLocation(neighId);
758 if (neighLocation != LevelSetCellLocation::NARROW_BAND_INTERSECTED) {
759 return false;
760 }
761
762 // Track neighbours that intersect the surface
763 intersectedCellIds.insert(neighId);
764
765 // Continue processing the other neighbours
766 return false;
767 };
768
769 mesh.processCellFaceNeighbours(cellId, 1, neighProcessor);
770 }
771 }
772
773 // Identify neighbours of cells that intersect the surface
774 //
775 // We may need the distance of cells that are not processed,
776 for (long cellId : intersectedCellIds) {
777 // Process face neighbours
778 auto neighProcessor = [this, &locationCache, &unknownZoneCellIds](long neighId, int layer) {
779 BITPIT_UNUSED(layer);
780
781 // Skip neighbours whose region has already been identified
782 if (getCellLocation(neighId) != LevelSetCellLocation::UNKNOWN) {
783 return false;
784 }
785
786 // The neighbour is inside the narrow band
787 locationCache->insertEntry(neighId, static_cast<char>(LevelSetCellLocation::NARROW_BAND_NEIGHBOUR));
788 unknownZoneCellIds.erase(neighId);
789
790 // Continue processing the other neighbours
791 return false;
792 };
793
794 mesh.processCellFaceNeighbours(cellId, 1, neighProcessor);
795 }
796
797 // Cells whose location is still unknown are in the bulk
798 for (long cellId : unknownZoneCellIds) {
799 locationCache->insertEntry(cellId, static_cast<char>(LevelSetCellLocation::BULK));
800 }
801
802#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
803 // Exchange ghost data
804 if (mesh.isPartitioned()) {
805 std::unique_ptr<DataCommunicator> dataCommunicator = m_kernel->createDataCommunicator();
806 startCellCacheExchange(mesh.getGhostCellExchangeSources(), m_cellLocationCacheId, dataCommunicator.get());
807 completeCellCacheExchange(mesh.getGhostCellExchangeTargets(), m_cellLocationCacheId, dataCommunicator.get());
808 }
809#endif
810}
811
826LevelSetCellLocation LevelSetObject::fillCellGeometricNarrowBandLocationCache(long id)
827{
828 // Get cell information
829 double cellCacheValue = evalCellValue(id, CELL_CACHE_IS_SIGNED);
830 double cellUnsigendValue = std::abs(cellCacheValue);
831
832 // Identify cells that are geometrically inside the narrow band
833 //
834 // First we need to check if the cell intersectes the surface, and only if it
835 // deosn't we should check if its distance is lower than the narrow band size.
836 LevelSetCellLocation cellLocation = LevelSetCellLocation::UNKNOWN;
837 if (_intersectSurface(id, cellUnsigendValue, CELL_LOCATION_INTERSECTION_MODE) == LevelSetIntersectionStatus::TRUE) {
838 cellLocation = LevelSetCellLocation::NARROW_BAND_INTERSECTED;
839 } else if (cellUnsigendValue <= m_narrowBandSize) {
840 cellLocation = LevelSetCellLocation::NARROW_BAND_DISTANCE;
841 }
842
843 if (cellLocation != LevelSetCellLocation::UNKNOWN) {
844 CellCacheCollection::ValueCache<char> *locationCache = getCellCache<char>(m_cellLocationCacheId);
845 locationCache->insertEntry(id, static_cast<char>(cellLocation));
846 }
847
848 // Fill the cache of the evaluated fields
849 //
850 // Now that the cell location has been identified, we can fill the cache of the
851 // evaluated fields.
852 fillFieldCellCache(LevelSetField::VALUE, id, cellCacheValue);
853
854 // Return the location
855 return cellLocation;
856}
857
863std::size_t LevelSetObject::createCellLocationCache()
864{
865 m_cellLocationCacheId = createCellCache<char>(LevelSetFillIn::DENSE);
866
867 return m_cellLocationCacheId;
868}
869
873void LevelSetObject::destroyCellLocationCache()
874{
875 destroyCellCache(m_cellLocationCacheId);
876 m_cellLocationCacheId = CellCacheCollection::NULL_CACHE_ID;
877}
878
894bool LevelSetObject::isCellInNarrowBand(long id)const
895{
896 LevelSetZone zone = getCellZone(id);
897
898 return (zone == LevelSetZone::NARROW_BAND);
899}
900
917bool LevelSetObject::isInNarrowBand(const std::array<double,3> &point)const
918{
919 // Early return if the object is empty
920 if (empty()) {
921 return false;
922 }
923
924 // Early return if no narrow band was set
925 if (m_narrowBandSize == LEVELSET_NARROW_BAND_UNLIMITED) {
926 return true;
927 }
928
929 // Explicitly check if the cell is inside the narrow band
930 double value = evalValue(point, false);
931 if (value <= m_narrowBandSize) {
932 return true;
933 }
934
935 return false;
936}
937
943LevelSetBulkEvaluationMode LevelSetObject::getCellBulkEvaluationMode() const
944{
945 return m_cellBulkEvaluationMode;
946}
947
953void LevelSetObject::setCellBulkEvaluationMode(LevelSetBulkEvaluationMode evaluationMode)
954{
955 // Early return if the bulk evaluation mode doesn't need to be updated
956 if (getCellBulkEvaluationMode() == evaluationMode) {
957 return;
958 }
959
960 // Destroy bulk data
961 //
962 // Current data need to be destroyed (not just cleared) because the updated bulk evaluation
963 // mode may require different storage types.
964 if (getKernel()) {
965 destroyCellBulkData();
966
967 for (std::size_t fieldIndex = 0; fieldIndex < static_cast<std::size_t>(LevelSetField::COUNT); ++fieldIndex) {
968 LevelSetField field = static_cast<LevelSetField>(fieldIndex);
969 LevelSetCacheMode fieldCacheMode = getFieldCellCacheMode(field);
970
971 bool destroyFieldCache = false;
972 if (fieldCacheMode == LevelSetCacheMode::ON_DEMAND) {
973 destroyFieldCache = true;
974 } else if (fieldCacheMode == LevelSetCacheMode::FULL) {
975 destroyFieldCache = true;
976 }
977
978 if (destroyFieldCache) {
979 destroyFieldCellCache(field);
980 }
981 }
982 }
983
984 // Set bulk evaluation mode
985 m_cellBulkEvaluationMode = evaluationMode;
986
987 // Evaluate data
988 if (getKernel()) {
989 evaluate();
990 }
991}
992
996void LevelSetObject::evaluateCellBulkData()
997{
998 if (m_cellBulkEvaluationMode == LevelSetBulkEvaluationMode::SIGN_PROPAGATION) {
999 createCellPropagatedSignCache();
1000 fillCellPropagatedSignCache();
1001 }
1002}
1003
1007void LevelSetObject::updateCellBulkData( const std::vector<adaption::Info> &adaptionData )
1008{
1009 BITPIT_UNUSED(adaptionData);
1010
1011 if (m_cellBulkEvaluationMode == LevelSetBulkEvaluationMode::SIGN_PROPAGATION) {
1012 fillCellPropagatedSignCache();
1013 }
1014}
1015
1019void LevelSetObject::destroyCellBulkData()
1020{
1021 if (m_cellBulkEvaluationMode == LevelSetBulkEvaluationMode::SIGN_PROPAGATION) {
1022 destroyCellPropagatedSignCache();
1023 }
1024}
1025
1029void LevelSetObject::fillCellPropagatedSignCache()
1030{
1031 const VolumeKernel &mesh = *(m_kernel->getMesh());
1032
1033#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1034 // Check if the communications are needed
1035 bool ghostExchangeNeeded = mesh.isPartitioned();
1036
1037 // Initialize ghost communications
1038 std::unique_ptr<DataCommunicator> ghostCommunicator;
1039 if (ghostExchangeNeeded) {
1040 ghostCommunicator = std::unique_ptr<DataCommunicator>(new DataCommunicator(mesh.getCommunicator()));
1041
1042 for (auto &entry : mesh.getGhostCellExchangeSources()) {
1043 const int rank = entry.first;
1044 const std::vector<long> &sources = entry.second;
1045 ghostCommunicator->setSend(rank, sources.size() * (sizeof(unsigned char) + sizeof(char)));
1046 }
1047
1048 for (auto &entry : mesh.getGhostCellExchangeTargets()) {
1049 const int rank = entry.first;
1050 const std::vector<long> &targets = entry.second;
1051 ghostCommunicator->setRecv(rank, targets.size() * (sizeof(unsigned char) + sizeof(char)));
1052 }
1053 }
1054#endif
1055
1056 // Get the ids associated with internal cells
1057 std::vector<long> internalCellIds;
1058 if (const VolCartesian *cartesianMesh = dynamic_cast<const VolCartesian *>(&mesh)) {
1059 long nCells = cartesianMesh->getCellCount();
1060 internalCellIds.resize(nCells);
1061 std::iota(internalCellIds.begin(), internalCellIds.end(), 0);
1062 } else {
1063 long nCells = mesh.getCellCount();
1064 VolumeKernel::CellConstIterator internalCellsBegin = mesh.internalCellConstBegin();
1065 VolumeKernel::CellConstIterator internalCellsEnd = mesh.internalCellConstEnd();
1066
1067 internalCellIds.reserve(nCells);
1068 for (VolumeKernel::CellConstIterator cellItr = internalCellsBegin; cellItr != internalCellsEnd; ++cellItr) {
1069 long cellId = cellItr.getId();
1070 internalCellIds.push_back(cellId);
1071 }
1072 }
1073
1074 // Get cache for sign propagation
1075 CellCacheCollection::ValueCache<char> *propagatedSignCache = getCellCache<char>(m_cellPropagatedSignCacheId);
1076
1077 // Clear sign propagation cache
1078 clearCellCache(m_cellPropagatedSignCacheId, false);
1079
1080 // Initialize sign propagation
1081 //
1082 // Sign propagation will start from the internal cells within the narrow band.
1083 // It is not possible to popagate a null sign.
1084 std::unordered_set<long> seedIds;
1085 for (long cellId : internalCellIds) {
1086 if (isCellInNarrowBand(cellId)) {
1087 char cellSign = static_cast<char>(evalCellSign(cellId));
1088 propagatedSignCache->insertEntry(cellId, cellSign);
1089 if (cellSign != 0) {
1090 seedIds.insert(cellId);
1091 }
1092 }
1093 }
1094
1095 // Propagate the sign
1096 std::vector<long> processList;
1097 while (true) {
1098 bool signMismatch = false;
1099 while (!seedIds.empty()) {
1100 // Get seed
1101 long seedId = *(seedIds.begin());
1102 seedIds.erase(seedIds.begin());
1103
1104 // Get seed sign
1105 CellCacheCollection::ValueCache<char>::Entry seedSignEntry = propagatedSignCache->findEntry(seedId);
1106 char seedSign = *(seedSignEntry);
1107
1108 // Propagate seed sign
1109 //
1110 // We need to continue processing until the process list is empty, even
1111 // if we have already processed the internal cells. The process list may
1112 // contain ghost cells that carry information received by other processes.
1113 processList.assign(1, seedId);
1114 while (!processList.empty()) {
1115 // Get cell to process
1116 long cellId = processList.back();
1117 processList.pop_back();
1118
1119 // Set the sign of the cell
1120 //
1121 // If the sign of the cell has already been set, we check if it matches
1122 // the seed sign and then we skip the cell, otherwise we set the sign of
1123 // the cell and we process its neighoburs. Once the sign of a cell is
1124 // set, we can remove it form the seed list (there is no need to start
1125 // again the porpagation from that cell, beause it will not reach any
1126 // new portions of the domain).
1127 if (cellId != seedId) {
1128 CellCacheCollection::ValueCache<char>::Entry cellSignEntry = propagatedSignCache->findEntry(cellId);
1129 if (cellSignEntry.isValid()) {
1130 char cellSign = *(cellSignEntry);
1131 if (cellSign != seedSign) {
1132 signMismatch = true;
1133 log::error() << "Sign mismatch on cell " << cellId << "!" << std::endl;
1134 break;
1135 } else {
1136 continue;
1137 }
1138 } else {
1139 propagatedSignCache->insertEntry(cellId, seedSign);
1140 seedIds.erase(cellId);
1141 }
1142 }
1143
1144 // Add face neighbours to the process list
1145 auto neighProcessor = [&mesh, &propagatedSignCache, &processList](long neighId, int layer) {
1146 BITPIT_UNUSED(layer);
1147#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==0
1148 BITPIT_UNUSED(mesh);
1149#endif
1150
1151 // Skip neighbours whose sign has already been set
1152 if (propagatedSignCache->contains(neighId)) {
1153 return false;
1154 }
1155
1156#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1157 // Skip ghost neighbours
1158 if (mesh.isPartitioned()) {
1159 VolumeKernel::CellConstIterator neighItr = mesh.getCellConstIterator(neighId);
1160 const Cell &neigh = *neighItr;
1161 if (!neigh.isInterior()) {
1162 return false;
1163 }
1164 }
1165#endif
1166
1167 // Add neighbour to the process list
1168 processList.push_back(neighId);
1169
1170 // Continue processing the other neighbours
1171 return false;
1172 };
1173
1174 mesh.processCellFaceNeighbours(cellId, 1, neighProcessor);
1175 }
1176
1177 // Stop processing if a sign mismatch was detected
1178 if (signMismatch) {
1179 break;
1180 }
1181 }
1182
1183 // Raise an error if a sign mismatch was detected
1184#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1185 if (ghostExchangeNeeded) {
1186 MPI_Allreduce(MPI_IN_PLACE, &signMismatch, 1, MPI_C_BOOL, MPI_LOR, mesh.getCommunicator());
1187 }
1188#endif
1189
1190 if (signMismatch) {
1191 throw std::runtime_error("Sign mismatch in sign propagation!");
1192 }
1193
1194#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1195 // Add ghost to the process list
1196 //
1197 // A ghost should be added to the process list if it has been processed by the owner
1198 // but is hasn't yet processed by the current process.
1199 if (ghostExchangeNeeded) {
1200 // Exchange ghost data
1201 ghostCommunicator->startAllRecvs();
1202
1203 for(auto &entry : mesh.getGhostCellExchangeSources()) {
1204 int rank = entry.first;
1205 SendBuffer &buffer = ghostCommunicator->getSendBuffer(rank);
1206 for (long cellId : entry.second) {
1207 CellCacheCollection::ValueCache<char>::Entry cellSignEntry = propagatedSignCache->findEntry(cellId);
1208
1209 char cellHasSign = cellSignEntry.isValid() ? 1 : 0;
1210 buffer << cellHasSign;
1211
1212 if (cellHasSign) {
1213 char cellSign = *(cellSignEntry);
1214 buffer << cellSign;
1215 }
1216 }
1217 ghostCommunicator->startSend(rank);
1218 }
1219
1220 bool ghostSignMismatch = false;
1221 int nPendingRecvs = ghostCommunicator->getRecvCount();
1222 while (nPendingRecvs != 0) {
1223 int rank = ghostCommunicator->waitAnyRecv();
1224 RecvBuffer buffer = ghostCommunicator->getRecvBuffer(rank);
1225
1226 for (long cellId : mesh.getGhostCellExchangeTargets(rank)) {
1227 char sourceHasSign;
1228 buffer >> sourceHasSign;
1229
1230 if (sourceHasSign == 1) {
1231 char sourceSign;
1232 buffer >> sourceSign;
1233
1234 if (!propagatedSignCache->contains(cellId)) {
1235 seedIds.insert(cellId);
1236 propagatedSignCache->insertEntry(cellId, sourceSign);
1237 } else {
1238 char cellCachedSign = *(propagatedSignCache->findEntry(cellId));
1239 if (cellCachedSign != sourceSign) {
1240 ghostSignMismatch = true;
1241 log::error() << "Sign mismatch on ghost cell " << cellId << "!" << getId() << std::endl;
1242 break;
1243 }
1244 }
1245 }
1246 }
1247
1248 --nPendingRecvs;
1249
1250 // Stop processing if a sign mismatch was detected
1251 if (ghostSignMismatch) {
1252 break;
1253 }
1254 }
1255
1256 ghostCommunicator->waitAllSends();
1257
1258 // Raise an error if there are ghosts with a sign mismatch
1259 if (ghostExchangeNeeded) {
1260 MPI_Allreduce(MPI_IN_PLACE, &ghostSignMismatch, 1, MPI_C_BOOL, MPI_LOR, mesh.getCommunicator());
1261 }
1262
1263 if (ghostSignMismatch) {
1264 throw std::runtime_error("Sign mismatch in sign propagation!");
1265 }
1266 }
1267#endif
1268
1269 // Detect if the propagation is completed
1270 bool completed = seedIds.empty();
1271#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
1272 if (ghostExchangeNeeded) {
1273 MPI_Allreduce(MPI_IN_PLACE, &completed, 1, MPI_C_BOOL, MPI_LAND, mesh.getCommunicator());
1274 }
1275#endif
1276
1277 if (completed) {
1278 break;
1279 }
1280 }
1281}
1282
1288std::size_t LevelSetObject::createCellPropagatedSignCache()
1289{
1290 m_cellPropagatedSignCacheId = createCellCache<char>(LevelSetFillIn::DENSE);
1291
1292 return m_cellPropagatedSignCacheId;
1293}
1294
1298void LevelSetObject::destroyCellPropagatedSignCache()
1299{
1300 destroyCellCache(m_cellPropagatedSignCacheId);
1301 m_cellPropagatedSignCacheId = CellCacheCollection::NULL_CACHE_ID;
1302}
1303
1337LevelSetIntersectionStatus LevelSetObject::intersectSurface(long id, LevelSetIntersectionMode mode) const
1338{
1339 // Try evaluating intersection information from the cell location
1340 //
1341 // Regardless from the requested mode, a cell can intersect the zero-levelset iso-surface
1342 // only if it is inside the narrow band.
1343 //
1344 // If the requested mode is the same mode used for identify the cell location, we can get the
1345 // intersection information directly from the location.
1346 LevelSetCellLocation cellLocation = getCellLocation(id);
1347 if (cellLocation == LevelSetCellLocation::BULK) {
1348 return LevelSetIntersectionStatus::FALSE;
1349 } else if (mode == CELL_LOCATION_INTERSECTION_MODE) {
1350 if (cellLocation == LevelSetCellLocation::NARROW_BAND_INTERSECTED) {
1351 return LevelSetIntersectionStatus::TRUE;
1352 } else if (cellLocation != LevelSetCellLocation::NARROW_BAND_UNDEFINED) {
1353 return LevelSetIntersectionStatus::FALSE;
1354 }
1355 }
1356
1357 // Check for intersection with zero-levelset iso-surface
1358 double distance = evalCellValue(id, false);
1359
1360 return _intersectSurface(id, distance, mode);
1361}
1362
1398LevelSetIntersectionStatus LevelSetObject::_intersectSurface(long id, double distance, LevelSetIntersectionMode mode) const
1399{
1400 double distanceTolerance = m_kernel->getDistanceTolerance();
1401
1402 switch(mode){
1403 case LevelSetIntersectionMode::FAST_GUARANTEE_TRUE:
1404 {
1405 double tangentSphere = m_kernel->computeCellTangentRadius(id) ;
1406 if(utils::DoubleFloatingLessEqual()(distance, tangentSphere, distanceTolerance, distanceTolerance)){
1407 return LevelSetIntersectionStatus::TRUE;
1408 } else {
1409 return LevelSetIntersectionStatus::FALSE;
1410 }
1411
1412 break;
1413 }
1414
1415 case LevelSetIntersectionMode::FAST_GUARANTEE_FALSE:
1416 {
1417 double boundingSphere = m_kernel->computeCellBoundingRadius(id) ;
1418 if(utils::DoubleFloatingGreater()(distance, boundingSphere, distanceTolerance, distanceTolerance)){
1419 return LevelSetIntersectionStatus::FALSE;
1420 } else {
1421 return LevelSetIntersectionStatus::TRUE;
1422 }
1423
1424 break;
1425 }
1426
1427 case LevelSetIntersectionMode::FAST_FUZZY:
1428 {
1429 double boundingSphere = m_kernel->computeCellBoundingRadius(id) ;
1430 if(utils::DoubleFloatingGreater()(distance, boundingSphere, distanceTolerance, distanceTolerance)){
1431 return LevelSetIntersectionStatus::FALSE;
1432 }
1433
1434 double tangentSphere = m_kernel->computeCellTangentRadius(id) ;
1435 if(utils::DoubleFloatingLessEqual()(distance, tangentSphere, distanceTolerance, distanceTolerance)){
1436 return LevelSetIntersectionStatus::TRUE;
1437 }
1438
1439 return LevelSetIntersectionStatus::CLOSE;
1440
1441 break;
1442 }
1443
1444 case LevelSetIntersectionMode::ACCURATE:
1445 {
1446 double boundingSphere = m_kernel->computeCellBoundingRadius(id) ;
1447 if(utils::DoubleFloatingGreater()(distance, boundingSphere, distanceTolerance, distanceTolerance)){
1448 return LevelSetIntersectionStatus::FALSE;
1449 }
1450
1451 double tangentSphere = m_kernel->computeCellTangentRadius(id) ;
1452 if(utils::DoubleFloatingLessEqual()(distance, tangentSphere, distanceTolerance, distanceTolerance)){
1453 return LevelSetIntersectionStatus::TRUE;
1454 }
1455
1456 std::array<double,3> root = evalCellProjectionPoint(id);
1457 std::array<double,3> normal = evalCellGradient(id, true);
1458 if( m_kernel->intersectCellPlane(id,root,normal, distanceTolerance) ){
1459 return LevelSetIntersectionStatus::TRUE;
1460 } else {
1461 return LevelSetIntersectionStatus::FALSE;
1462 }
1463
1464 break;
1465 }
1466 }
1467
1468 BITPIT_UNREACHABLE("cannot reach");
1469
1470}
1471
1477short LevelSetObject::evalCellSign(long id) const {
1478
1479 // Define sign evaluators
1480 auto evaluator = [this] (long id)
1481 {
1482 // Try fetching the sign from sign propagation
1483 CellCacheCollection::ValueCache<char> *propagatedSignCache = getCellCache<char>(m_cellPropagatedSignCacheId);
1484 if (propagatedSignCache) {
1485 CellCacheCollection::ValueCache<char>::Entry propagatedSignCacheEntry = propagatedSignCache->findEntry(id);
1486 if (propagatedSignCacheEntry.isValid()) {
1487 return static_cast<short>(*propagatedSignCacheEntry);
1488 }
1489 }
1490
1491 // Try fetching the sign from the cached value
1492 if (getCellBulkEvaluationMode() == LevelSetBulkEvaluationMode::EXACT) {
1493 CellCacheCollection::ValueCache<double> *valueCache = getFieldCellCache<double>(LevelSetField::VALUE);
1494 if (valueCache) {
1495 LevelSetCacheMode signCacheMode = getFieldCellCacheMode(LevelSetField::SIGN);
1496 LevelSetCacheMode valueCacheMode = getFieldCellCacheMode(LevelSetField::VALUE);
1497 if (valueCacheMode == LevelSetCacheMode::FULL || signCacheMode == valueCacheMode) {
1498 CellCacheCollection::ValueCache<double>::Entry valueCacheEntry = valueCache->findEntry(id);
1499 if (valueCacheEntry.isValid()) {
1500 return evalValueSign(*valueCacheEntry);
1501 }
1502 }
1503 }
1504 }
1505
1506 // Evaluate the sign
1507 return _evalCellSign(id);
1508 };
1509
1510 auto fallback = [this] (long id)
1511 {
1512 // Try fetching the sign from sign propagation
1513 CellCacheCollection::ValueCache<char> *propagatedSignCache = getCellCache<char>(m_cellPropagatedSignCacheId);
1514 if (propagatedSignCache) {
1515
1516 CellCacheCollection::ValueCache<char>::Entry propagatedSignCacheEntry = propagatedSignCache->findEntry(id);
1517 if (propagatedSignCacheEntry.isValid()) {
1518 return static_cast<short>(*propagatedSignCacheEntry);
1519 }
1520 }
1521
1522 // Return a dummy value
1523 return levelSetDefaults::SIGN;
1524 };
1525
1526 LevelSetField field = LevelSetField::SIGN;
1527 short sign = evalCellFieldCached<short>(field, id, evaluator, fallback);
1528
1529 return sign;
1530}
1531
1538double LevelSetObject::evalCellValue(long id, bool signedLevelSet) const {
1539
1540 // Evaluate signed value
1541 //
1542 // The value stored in the cache is unsigned.
1543 auto evaluator = [this] (long id)
1544 {
1545 return _evalCellValue(id, false);
1546 };
1547
1548 auto fallback = [] (long id)
1549 {
1550 BITPIT_UNUSED(id);
1551
1552 return levelSetDefaults::VALUE;
1553 };
1554
1555 LevelSetField field = LevelSetField::VALUE;
1556 double value = evalCellFieldCached<double>(field, id, evaluator, fallback);
1557
1558 // Evaluate the value with the correct signdness
1559 if (signedLevelSet) {
1560 value *= evalCellSign(id);
1561 }
1562
1563 return value;
1564}
1565
1572std::array<double,3> LevelSetObject::evalCellGradient(long id, bool signedLevelSet) const {
1573 // Evaluate signed gradient
1574 //
1575 // The gradient stored in the cache is unsigned.
1576 auto evaluator = [this] (long id)
1577 {
1578 return _evalCellGradient(id, false);
1579 };
1580
1581 auto fallback = [] (long id)
1582 {
1583 BITPIT_UNUSED(id);
1584
1585 return levelSetDefaults::GRADIENT;
1586 };
1587
1588 LevelSetField field = LevelSetField::GRADIENT;
1589 std::array<double, 3> gradient = evalCellFieldCached<std::array<double, 3>>(field, id, evaluator, fallback);
1590
1591 // Evaluate the gradient with the correct signdness
1592 if (signedLevelSet) {
1593 short cellSign = evalCellSign(id);
1594 if (cellSign <= 0) {
1595 gradient *= static_cast<double>(cellSign);
1596 }
1597 }
1598
1599 return gradient;
1600}
1601
1608std::array<double,3> LevelSetObject::evalCellProjectionPoint(long id) const {
1609 return m_kernel->computeCellCentroid(id) - evalCellValue(id, true) * evalCellGradient(id, true);
1610}
1611
1617short LevelSetObject::evalSign(const std::array<double,3> &point) const {
1618 return _evalSign(point);
1619}
1620
1627double LevelSetObject::evalValue(const std::array<double,3> &point, bool signedLevelSet) const {
1628 return _evalValue(point, signedLevelSet);
1629}
1630
1637std::array<double,3> LevelSetObject::evalGradient(const std::array<double,3> &point, bool signedLevelSet) const {
1638 return _evalGradient(point, signedLevelSet);
1639}
1640
1647short LevelSetObject::_evalSign(const std::array<double,3> &point) const {
1648 return evalValueSign(this->evalValue(point, true));
1649}
1650
1656std::array<double,3> LevelSetObject::evalProjectionPoint(const std::array<double,3> &point) const{
1657 return point - evalValue(point, true) * evalGradient(point, true);
1658}
1659
1665short LevelSetObject::evalValueSign(double value) const{
1666 return static_cast<short>(sign(value));
1667}
1668
1673void LevelSetObject::dump( std::ostream &stream ){
1674 // Identifier
1675 utils::binary::write(stream, m_id) ;
1676 utils::binary::write(stream, m_nReferences) ;
1677
1678 // Object properties
1679 utils::binary::write(stream, m_defaultSignedLevelSet) ;
1680 utils::binary::write(stream, m_narrowBandSize) ;
1681 utils::binary::write(stream, m_cellBulkEvaluationMode) ;
1682
1683 // Restore cell caches
1684 utils::binary::write(stream, m_cellLocationCacheId);
1685 utils::binary::write(stream, m_cellPropagatedSignCacheId);
1686
1687 std::size_t nCaches = m_cellCacheCollection->size();
1688 utils::binary::write(stream, nCaches);
1689 for (std::size_t cacheId = 0; cacheId < nCaches; ++cacheId) {
1690 CellCacheCollection::Item &cacheItem = (*m_cellCacheCollection)[cacheId];
1691
1692 // Skip items without a factory
1693 bool hasFactory = cacheItem.hasFactory();
1694 utils::binary::write(stream, hasFactory);
1695 if (!hasFactory) {
1696 continue;
1697 }
1698
1699 // Field information
1700 LevelSetField field = LevelSetField::UNDEFINED;
1701 for (std::size_t fieldIndex = 0; fieldIndex < static_cast<std::size_t>(LevelSetField::COUNT); ++fieldIndex) {
1702 field = static_cast<LevelSetField>(fieldIndex);
1703 if (cacheId == getFieldCellCacheId(field)) {
1704 break;
1705 } else {
1706 field = LevelSetField::UNDEFINED;
1707 }
1708 }
1709
1710 utils::binary::write(stream, field);
1711 if (field != LevelSetField::UNDEFINED) {
1712 utils::binary::write(stream, getFieldCellCacheMode(field));
1713 }
1714
1715 // Dump the cache
1716 bool hasCache = cacheItem.hasCache();
1717 utils::binary::write(stream, hasCache);
1718 if (hasCache) {
1719 CellCacheCollection::Cache *cache = cacheItem.getCache();
1720 cache->dump(stream);
1721 }
1722 }
1723
1724 // Output fields
1725 std::size_t nEnabledOutputFields = m_enabledOutputFields.size() ;
1726 utils::binary::write(stream, nEnabledOutputFields) ;
1727 for (const auto &fieldEntry : m_enabledOutputFields) {
1728 utils::binary::write(stream, fieldEntry.first) ;
1729 utils::binary::write(stream, fieldEntry.second) ;
1730 }
1731}
1732
1737void LevelSetObject::restore( std::istream &stream ){
1738 // Disable output
1739 LevelSetFieldset enabledOutputFieldset;
1740 enabledOutputFieldset.reserve(m_enabledOutputFields.size());
1741 for ( const auto &fieldEntry : m_enabledOutputFields ) {
1742 enabledOutputFieldset.push_back(fieldEntry.first);
1743 }
1744
1745 enableVTKOutput(enabledOutputFieldset, false);
1746
1747 // Reset object information
1748 for (std::size_t fieldIndex = 0; fieldIndex < static_cast<std::size_t>(LevelSetField::COUNT); ++fieldIndex) {
1749 m_cellFieldCacheModes[fieldIndex] = LevelSetCacheMode::NONE;
1750 m_cellFieldCacheIds[fieldIndex] = CellCacheCollection::NULL_CACHE_ID;
1751 }
1752
1753 m_cellPropagatedSignCacheId = CellCacheCollection::NULL_CACHE_ID;
1754 m_cellLocationCacheId = CellCacheCollection::NULL_CACHE_ID;
1755
1756 m_cellCacheCollection->clear();
1757
1758 // Identifier
1759 utils::binary::read(stream, m_id) ;
1760 utils::binary::read(stream, m_nReferences) ;
1761
1762 // Object properties
1763 utils::binary::read(stream, m_defaultSignedLevelSet) ;
1764 utils::binary::read(stream, m_narrowBandSize) ;
1765 utils::binary::read(stream, m_cellBulkEvaluationMode) ;
1766
1767 // Cell caches
1768 std::size_t expectedCellLocationCacheId;
1769 utils::binary::read(stream, expectedCellLocationCacheId);
1770
1771 std::size_t expectedCellPropagatedSignCacheId;
1772 utils::binary::read(stream, expectedCellPropagatedSignCacheId);
1773
1774 std::size_t nCaches;
1775 utils::binary::read(stream, nCaches);
1776 for (std::size_t cacheId = 0; cacheId < nCaches; ++cacheId) {
1777 // Skip items without a factory
1778 bool hasFactory;
1779 utils::binary::read(stream, hasFactory);
1780 if (!hasFactory) {
1781 continue;
1782 }
1783
1784 // Field information
1785 LevelSetField field;
1786 utils::binary::read(stream, field);
1787 if (field != LevelSetField::UNDEFINED) {
1788 std::size_t fieldIndex = static_cast<std::size_t>(field);
1789 utils::binary::read(stream, m_cellFieldCacheModes[fieldIndex]);
1790 }
1791
1792 // Restore the cache
1793 bool hasCache;
1794 utils::binary::read(stream, hasCache);
1795 if (hasCache) {
1796 // Create the cache
1797 if (cacheId == expectedCellLocationCacheId) {
1798 createCellLocationCache();
1799 assert(m_cellLocationCacheId == cacheId);
1800 } else if (cacheId == expectedCellPropagatedSignCacheId) {
1801 createCellPropagatedSignCache();
1802 assert(cacheId == m_cellPropagatedSignCacheId);
1803 } else if (field != LevelSetField::UNDEFINED) {
1804 createFieldCellCache(field);
1805 assert(cacheId == getFieldCellCacheId(field));
1806 } else {
1807 throw std::runtime_error("Unable to restore levelset object " + std::to_string(getId()) + "!");
1808 }
1809
1810 // Restore cache contents
1811 CellCacheCollection::Cache *cache = getCellCache(cacheId);
1812 cache->restore(stream);
1813 }
1814 }
1815
1816 // Enable output
1817 std::size_t nEnabledVTKOutputs ;
1818 utils::binary::read(stream, nEnabledVTKOutputs) ;
1819 for (std::size_t i = 0; i < nEnabledVTKOutputs; ++i) {
1820 LevelSetField field ;
1821 std::string fieldName;
1822 utils::binary::read(stream, field) ;
1823 utils::binary::read(stream, fieldName) ;
1824
1825 enableVTKOutput(field, fieldName);
1826 }
1827}
1828
1834void LevelSetObject::enableVTKOutput( const LevelSetFieldset &fieldset, bool enable) {
1835
1836 std::stringstream objectNameStream;
1837 objectNameStream << getId();
1838
1839 enableVTKOutput(fieldset, objectNameStream.str(), enable);
1840
1841}
1842
1850void LevelSetObject::enableVTKOutput( const LevelSetFieldset &fieldset, const std::string &objectName, bool enable) {
1851
1852 for (LevelSetField field : fieldset) {
1853 enableVTKOutput(field, objectName, enable);
1854 }
1855
1856}
1857
1863void LevelSetObject::enableVTKOutput( LevelSetField field, bool enable) {
1864
1865 std::stringstream objectNameStream;
1866 objectNameStream << getId();
1867
1868 enableVTKOutput(field, objectNameStream.str(), enable);
1869
1870}
1871
1879void LevelSetObject::enableVTKOutput( LevelSetField field, const std::string &objectName, bool enable) {
1880
1881 // Discard fields that are not supported
1882 LevelSetFieldset supportedFields = getSupportedFields();
1883 if (std::find(supportedFields.begin(), supportedFields.end(), field) == supportedFields.end()) {
1884 return;
1885 }
1886
1887 // Check if the state of the filed is already the requested one
1888 if (enable == hasVTKOutputData(field, objectName)) {
1889 return;
1890 }
1891
1892 // Process the field
1893 if (!enable) {
1894 removeVTKOutputData(field, objectName) ;
1895 m_enabledOutputFields.erase(field) ;
1896 } else {
1897 addVTKOutputData(field, objectName) ;
1898 m_enabledOutputFields.insert({field, getVTKOutputDataName(field, objectName)}) ;
1899 }
1900
1901}
1902
1908void LevelSetObject::enableVTKOutput( LevelSetWriteField field, bool enable) {
1909
1910 std::stringstream objectNameStream;
1911 objectNameStream << getId();
1912
1913 enableVTKOutput(field, objectNameStream.str(), enable);
1914
1915}
1916
1924void LevelSetObject::enableVTKOutput( LevelSetWriteField writeField, const std::string &objectName, bool enable) {
1925
1926 LevelSetFieldset fieldset;
1927 if( writeField==LevelSetWriteField::ALL){
1928 fieldset = getSupportedFields();
1929
1930 } else if ( writeField==LevelSetWriteField::DEFAULT){
1931 fieldset.push_back(LevelSetField::VALUE);
1932 fieldset.push_back(LevelSetField::GRADIENT);
1933
1934 } else {
1935 LevelSetField field = static_cast<LevelSetField>(writeField);
1936
1937 LevelSetFieldset supportedFields = getSupportedFields();
1938 if (std::find(supportedFields.begin(), supportedFields.end(), field) == supportedFields.end()) {
1939 log::warning() << "The specified field is not supported by the levelset object" << std::endl;
1940 return;
1941 }
1942
1943 fieldset.push_back(field);
1944 }
1945
1946 enableVTKOutput( fieldset, objectName, enable);
1947
1948}
1949
1958bool LevelSetObject::hasVTKOutputData( LevelSetField field, const std::string &objectName) const {
1959
1960 VTK &vtkWriter = m_kernel->getMesh()->getVTK() ;
1961 std::string name = getVTKOutputDataName(field, objectName);
1962
1963 return vtkWriter.hasData(name);
1964
1965}
1966
1973void LevelSetObject::removeVTKOutputData( LevelSetField field, const std::string &objectName) {
1974
1975 VTK &vtkWriter = m_kernel->getMesh()->getVTK() ;
1976 std::string name = getVTKOutputDataName(field, objectName);
1977
1978 vtkWriter.removeData(name);
1979
1980}
1981
1988void LevelSetObject::addVTKOutputData( LevelSetField field, const std::string &objectName) {
1989
1990 VTK &vtkWriter = m_kernel->getMesh()->getVTK() ;
1991 std::string name = getVTKOutputDataName(field, objectName);
1992
1993 switch(field){
1994
1995 case LevelSetField::VALUE:
1996 vtkWriter.addData<double>( name, VTKFieldType::SCALAR, VTKLocation::CELL, this);
1997 break;
1998
1999 case LevelSetField::SIGN:
2000 vtkWriter.addData<short>( name, VTKFieldType::SCALAR, VTKLocation::CELL, this);
2001 break;
2002
2003 case LevelSetField::GRADIENT:
2004 vtkWriter.addData<double>( name, VTKFieldType::VECTOR, VTKLocation::CELL, this);
2005 break;
2006
2007 default:
2008 throw std::runtime_error("Unsupported value of field in LevelSetObject::addDataToVTK() ");
2009 break;
2010
2011 }
2012
2013}
2014
2022std::string LevelSetObject::getVTKOutputDataName( LevelSetField field, const std::string &objectName) const {
2023
2024 std::stringstream nameStream;
2025 nameStream << "levelset" << getVTKOutputFieldName(field) << "_" << objectName;
2026 std::string name = nameStream.str();
2027
2028 return name;
2029
2030}
2031
2038std::string LevelSetObject::getVTKOutputFieldName( LevelSetField field) const {
2039
2040 switch(field){
2041
2042 case LevelSetField::VALUE:
2043 return "Value";
2044
2045 case LevelSetField::SIGN:
2046 return "Sign";
2047
2048 case LevelSetField::GRADIENT:
2049 return "Gradient";
2050
2051 default:
2052 throw std::runtime_error("Unsupported value of field in LevelSetObject::addDataToVTK() ");
2053 break;
2054
2055 }
2056
2057}
2058
2069void LevelSetObject::flushData( std::fstream &stream, const std::string &name, VTKFormat format){
2070
2071 for ( const auto &fieldEntry : m_enabledOutputFields ) {
2072 const std::string &fieldName = fieldEntry.second;
2073 if (utils::string::keywordInString(name, fieldName)) {
2074 LevelSetField field = fieldEntry.first;
2075 flushVTKOutputData(stream, format, field);
2076 }
2077 }
2078
2079}
2080
2093void LevelSetObject::flushVTKOutputData(std::fstream &stream, VTKFormat format, LevelSetField field) const {
2094
2095 switch(field) {
2096
2097 case LevelSetField::VALUE:
2098 {
2099 auto evaluator = [this] (long id) { return evalCellValue(id, true); };
2100 auto fallback = [] (long id) { BITPIT_UNUSED(id); return levelSetDefaults::VALUE; };
2101 flushVTKOutputData<double>(stream, format, field, evaluator, fallback);
2102 break;
2103 }
2104
2105 case LevelSetField::SIGN:
2106 {
2107 auto evaluator = [this] (long id) { return (short) evalCellSign(id); };
2108 auto fallback = [] (long id) { BITPIT_UNUSED(id); return levelSetDefaults::SIGN; };
2109 flushVTKOutputData<short>(stream, format, field, evaluator, fallback);
2110 break;
2111 }
2112
2113 case LevelSetField::GRADIENT:
2114 {
2115 auto evaluator = [this] (long id) { return evalCellGradient(id, true); };
2116 auto fallback = [] (long id) { BITPIT_UNUSED(id); return levelSetDefaults::GRADIENT; };
2117 flushVTKOutputData<std::array<double, 3>>(stream, format, field, evaluator, fallback);
2118 break;
2119 }
2120
2121 default:
2122 {
2123 throw std::runtime_error("Unable to write the field.");
2124 }
2125
2126 }
2127}
2128
2129#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
2137void LevelSetObject::startCellCacheExchange( const std::unordered_map<int, std::vector<long>> &sendCellIds,
2138 std::size_t cacheId, DataCommunicator *dataCommunicator) const
2139{
2140 startCellCachesExchange(sendCellIds, std::vector<std::size_t>(1, cacheId), dataCommunicator);
2141}
2142
2150void LevelSetObject::startCellCachesExchange( const std::unordered_map<int, std::vector<long>> &sendCellIds,
2151 const std::vector<std::size_t> &cacheIds,
2152 DataCommunicator *dataCommunicator) const {
2153
2154 // Fill the exchange buffer with the content of the cache
2155 dataCommunicator->clearAllSends(false);
2156 for (const auto &entry : sendCellIds) {
2157 // Create an empty send
2158 int rank = entry.first;
2159 dataCommunicator->setSend(rank, 0);
2160
2161 // Write data in the buffer
2162 const std::vector<long> &rankSendCellIds = entry.second;
2163 SendBuffer &buffer = dataCommunicator->getSendBuffer(rank);
2164 for (std::size_t cacheId : cacheIds) {
2165 getCellCache(cacheId)->writeBuffer(rankSendCellIds, buffer);
2166 }
2167 buffer.squeeze( ) ;
2168 }
2169
2170 // Discover the receives
2171 dataCommunicator->discoverRecvs();
2172
2173 // Start the sends
2174 dataCommunicator->startAllRecvs();
2175
2176 // Start the sends
2177 dataCommunicator->startAllSends();
2178
2179}
2180
2188void LevelSetObject::completeCellCacheExchange( const std::unordered_map<int, std::vector<long>> &recvCellIds,
2189 std::size_t cacheId, DataCommunicator *dataCommunicator)
2190{
2191 completeCellCachesExchange(recvCellIds, std::vector<std::size_t>(1, cacheId), dataCommunicator);
2192}
2193
2201void LevelSetObject::completeCellCachesExchange( const std::unordered_map<int, std::vector<long>> &recvCellIds,
2202 const std::vector<std::size_t> &cacheIds,
2203 DataCommunicator *dataCommunicator){
2204
2205 // Read cache data from the exchange buffer
2206 int nCompletedRecvs = 0;
2207 while (nCompletedRecvs < dataCommunicator->getRecvCount()) {
2208 int rank = dataCommunicator->waitAnyRecv();
2209
2210 const std::vector<long> &rankRecvCellIds = recvCellIds.at(rank);
2211 RecvBuffer &buffer = dataCommunicator->getRecvBuffer(rank);
2212 for (std::size_t cacheId : cacheIds) {
2213 getCellCache(cacheId)->readBuffer(rankRecvCellIds, buffer);
2214 }
2215
2216 ++nCompletedRecvs;
2217 }
2218
2219 // Wait completion of all sends
2220 dataCommunicator->waitAllSends();
2221
2222}
2223#endif
2224
2231LevelSetCacheMode LevelSetObject::getFieldCellCacheMode(LevelSetField field) const
2232{
2233 std::size_t fieldIndex = static_cast<std::size_t>(field);
2234
2235 return m_cellFieldCacheModes[fieldIndex];
2236}
2237
2249void LevelSetObject::enableFieldCellCache(LevelSetField field, LevelSetCacheMode cacheMode)
2250{
2251 // Early return if the cache mode doesn't need to be updated
2252 if (getFieldCellCacheMode(field) == cacheMode) {
2253 return;
2254 }
2255
2256 // Early return if the cache should be disabled
2257 if (cacheMode == LevelSetCacheMode::NONE) {
2258 disableFieldCellCache(field);
2259 return;
2260 }
2261
2262 // Destroy existing cache
2263 destroyFieldCellCache(field);
2264
2265 // Update field properties
2266 std::size_t fieldIndex = static_cast<std::size_t>(field);
2267 m_cellFieldCacheModes[fieldIndex] = cacheMode;
2268
2269 // Update data
2270 if (getKernel()) {
2271 // Create field cell caches
2272 createFieldCellCache(field);
2273
2274 // Fill field cell caches inside the narrow band
2275 fillFieldCellCaches(LevelSetZone::NARROW_BAND, std::vector<LevelSetField>(1, field));
2276
2277 // Fill field cell caches inside the bulk
2278 fillFieldCellCaches(LevelSetZone::BULK, std::vector<LevelSetField>(1, field));
2279 }
2280}
2281
2287void LevelSetObject::disableFieldCellCache(LevelSetField field)
2288{
2289 // Early return if no cache is associated with the field
2290 if (getFieldCellCacheMode(field) == LevelSetCacheMode::NONE) {
2291 return;
2292 }
2293
2294 // Destroy the cache
2295 destroyFieldCellCache(field);
2296
2297 // Update field properties
2298 std::size_t fieldIndex = static_cast<std::size_t>(field);
2299 m_cellFieldCacheModes[fieldIndex] = LevelSetCacheMode::NONE;
2300}
2301
2310void LevelSetObject::adaptCellCaches( const std::vector<adaption::Info> &adaptionData )
2311{
2312#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
2313 // Get mesh information
2314 const VolumeKernel &mesh = *(m_kernel->getMesh());
2315#endif
2316
2317 // Early return if all the caches are empty
2318 bool allCachesEmpty = true;
2319 for (std::size_t cacheId = 0; cacheId < m_cellCacheCollection->size(); ++cacheId) {
2320 CellCacheCollection::Item &cacheItem = (*m_cellCacheCollection)[cacheId];
2321 if (cacheItem.hasCache()) {
2322 allCachesEmpty = false;
2323 break;
2324 }
2325 }
2326
2327#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
2328 if (mesh.isPartitioned()) {
2329 MPI_Allreduce(MPI_IN_PLACE, &allCachesEmpty, 1, MPI_C_BOOL, MPI_LAND, m_kernel->getCommunicator()) ;
2330 }
2331#endif
2332
2333 if (allCachesEmpty) {
2334 return;
2335 }
2336
2337#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
2338 // Identify the ids of the non-volatile caches
2339 std::vector<std::size_t> nonVolatileCellCacheIds;
2340
2341 CellCacheCollection::Cache *locationCache = getCellCache(m_cellLocationCacheId);
2342 if (locationCache && !locationCache->isVolatile()) {
2343 nonVolatileCellCacheIds.push_back(m_cellLocationCacheId);
2344 }
2345
2346 for (std::size_t fieldIndex = 0; fieldIndex < static_cast<std::size_t>(LevelSetField::COUNT); ++fieldIndex) {
2347 LevelSetField field = static_cast<LevelSetField>(fieldIndex);
2348 CellCacheCollection::Cache *fieldCache = getFieldCellCache(field);
2349 if (fieldCache && !fieldCache->isVolatile()) {
2350 std::size_t fieldCacheId = getFieldCellCacheId(field);
2351 nonVolatileCellCacheIds.push_back(fieldCacheId);
2352 }
2353 }
2354
2355 // Initialize data exchange
2356 //
2357 // Data exchange can be performed only for non-volatile caches.
2358 std::unordered_map<int, std::vector<long>> exchangeSendList ;
2359 std::unordered_map<int, std::vector<long>> exchangeRecvList ;
2360 if (!nonVolatileCellCacheIds.empty()) {
2361 if (m_kernel->getMesh()->isPartitioned()) {
2362 for( const adaption::Info &adaptionInfo : adaptionData){
2363 if( adaptionInfo.entity != adaption::Entity::ENTITY_CELL){
2364 continue;
2365 }
2366
2367 switch (adaptionInfo.type) {
2368
2369 case adaption::Type::TYPE_PARTITION_SEND:
2370 exchangeSendList.insert({{adaptionInfo.rank,adaptionInfo.previous}}) ;
2371 break;
2372
2373 case adaption::Type::TYPE_PARTITION_RECV:
2374 exchangeRecvList.insert({{adaptionInfo.rank,adaptionInfo.current}}) ;
2375 break;
2376
2377 default:
2378 break;
2379
2380 }
2381 }
2382 }
2383 }
2384
2385 bool exchangeCacheData = (!exchangeSendList.empty() || !exchangeRecvList.empty());
2386 if (m_kernel->getMesh()->isPartitioned()) {
2387 MPI_Allreduce(MPI_IN_PLACE, &exchangeCacheData, 1, MPI_C_BOOL, MPI_LOR, m_kernel->getCommunicator()) ;
2388 }
2389
2390 // Create data communicator
2391 std::unique_ptr<DataCommunicator> dataCommunicator;
2392 if (exchangeCacheData) {
2393 dataCommunicator = m_kernel->createDataCommunicator() ;
2394 }
2395#endif
2396
2397#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
2398 // Start data exchange
2399 if (exchangeCacheData) {
2400 startCellCachesExchange(exchangeSendList, nonVolatileCellCacheIds, dataCommunicator.get());
2401 }
2402#endif
2403
2404 // Remove stale entries from the caches
2405 std::vector<long> staleCellIds = evalCellCacheStaleIds(adaptionData);
2406
2407 for (std::size_t cacheId = 0; cacheId < m_cellCacheCollection->size(); ++cacheId) {
2408 CellCacheCollection::Item &cacheItem = (*m_cellCacheCollection)[cacheId];
2409 if (!cacheItem.hasCache()) {
2410 continue;
2411 }
2412
2413 pruneCellCache(cacheId, staleCellIds);
2414 }
2415
2416#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
2417 // Complete data exchange
2418 if (exchangeCacheData) {
2419 completeCellCachesExchange(exchangeRecvList, nonVolatileCellCacheIds, dataCommunicator.get());
2420 }
2421#endif
2422}
2423
2431void LevelSetObject::clearCellCache( std::size_t cacheId, bool release )
2432{
2433 CellCacheCollection::Item &cacheItem = (*m_cellCacheCollection)[cacheId];
2434
2435 if (release) {
2436 cacheItem.destroyCache();
2437 } else if (cacheItem.hasCache()) {
2438 CellCacheCollection::Cache *cache = cacheItem.getCache();
2439 cache->clear();
2440 }
2441}
2442
2449void LevelSetObject::pruneCellCache(std::size_t cacheId, const std::vector<long> &cellIds)
2450{
2451 // Get cache
2452 CellCacheCollection::Item &cacheItem = (*m_cellCacheCollection)[cacheId];
2453 if (!cacheItem.hasCache()) {
2454 return;
2455 }
2456
2457 CellCacheCollection::Cache *cache = cacheItem.getCache();
2458
2459 // Remove entries
2460 cache->erase(cellIds);
2461
2462 // Reclaim unused memory
2463 if (m_kernel->getExpectedFillIn() == LevelSetFillIn::SPARSE) {
2464 cache->shrink_to_fit();
2465 }
2466}
2467
2475std::vector<long> LevelSetObject::evalCellCacheFillIds(LevelSetZone zone, LevelSetCacheMode cacheMode) const
2476{
2477 switch (cacheMode) {
2478
2479 case LevelSetCacheMode::ON_DEMAND:
2480 return evalCellOnDemandCacheFillIds(zone);
2481
2482 case LevelSetCacheMode::NARROW_BAND:
2483 return evalCellNarrowBandCacheFillIds(zone);
2484
2485 case LevelSetCacheMode::FULL:
2486 return evalCellFullCacheFillIds(zone);
2487
2488 default:
2489 throw std::runtime_error("Unsupported cache mode!");
2490
2491 }
2492}
2493
2504std::vector<long> LevelSetObject::evalCellCacheFillIds(LevelSetZone zone, LevelSetCacheMode cacheMode,
2505 const std::vector<adaption::Info> &adaptionData) const
2506{
2507 switch (cacheMode) {
2508
2509 case LevelSetCacheMode::ON_DEMAND:
2510 return evalCellOnDemandCacheFillIds(zone, adaptionData);
2511
2512 case LevelSetCacheMode::NARROW_BAND:
2513 return evalCellNarrowBandCacheFillIds(zone, adaptionData);
2514
2515 case LevelSetCacheMode::FULL:
2516 return evalCellFullCacheFillIds(zone, adaptionData);
2517
2518 default:
2519 throw std::runtime_error("Unsupported cache mode!");
2520
2521 }
2522}
2523
2532std::vector<long> LevelSetObject::evalCellOnDemandCacheFillIds(LevelSetZone zone) const
2533{
2534 BITPIT_UNUSED(zone);
2535
2536 return std::vector<long>();
2537}
2538
2550std::vector<long> LevelSetObject::evalCellOnDemandCacheFillIds(LevelSetZone zone, const std::vector<adaption::Info> &adaptionData) const
2551{
2552 BITPIT_UNUSED(zone);
2553 BITPIT_UNUSED(adaptionData);
2554
2555 return std::vector<long>();
2556}
2557
2566std::vector<long> LevelSetObject::evalCellNarrowBandCacheFillIds(LevelSetZone zone) const
2567{
2568 // Early return if the object is empty
2569 if (empty()) {
2570 return std::vector<long>();
2571 }
2572
2573 // There are no narrow band cells in the bulk
2574 if (zone == LevelSetZone::BULK) {
2575 return std::vector<long>();
2576 }
2577
2578 // Get mesh information
2579 const VolumeKernel &mesh = *(m_kernel->getMesh()) ;
2580
2581 // Detect the cells to be filled
2582 //
2583 // If no narrow band size was set, all cells should be filled, otherwise only
2584 // the cells inside the narrow band should be filled.
2585 if (m_narrowBandSize == LEVELSET_NARROW_BAND_UNLIMITED) {
2586 if (const VolCartesian *cartesianMesh = dynamic_cast<const VolCartesian *>(&mesh)) {
2587 long nCells = cartesianMesh->getCellCount();
2588 std::vector<long> cellFillIds(nCells);
2589 std::iota(cellFillIds.begin(), cellFillIds.end(), 0);
2590
2591 return cellFillIds;
2592 } else {
2593 return mesh.getCells().getIds(false);
2594 }
2595 } else {
2596 std::vector<long> cellFillIds;
2597 if (const VolCartesian *cartesianMesh = dynamic_cast<const VolCartesian *>(&mesh)) {
2598 long nCells = cartesianMesh->getCellCount();
2599 for (long cellId = 0; cellId < nCells; ++cellId) {
2600 if (isCellInNarrowBand(cellId)) {
2601 cellFillIds.push_back(cellId);
2602 }
2603 }
2604 } else {
2605 for (const Cell &cell : mesh.getCells()) {
2606 long cellId = cell.getId();
2607 if (isCellInNarrowBand(cellId)) {
2608 cellFillIds.push_back(cellId);
2609 }
2610 }
2611 }
2612
2613 return cellFillIds;
2614 }
2615}
2616
2628std::vector<long> LevelSetObject::evalCellNarrowBandCacheFillIds(LevelSetZone zone, const std::vector<adaption::Info> &adaptionData) const
2629{
2630 // Early return if the object is empty
2631 if (empty()) {
2632 return std::vector<long>();
2633 }
2634
2635 // There are no narrow band cells in the bulk
2636 if (zone == LevelSetZone::BULK) {
2637 return std::vector<long>();
2638 }
2639
2640 // Detect the cells to be filled
2641 //
2642 // If no narrow band size was set, all new cells should be filled, otherwise only
2643 // the cells inside the narrow band should be filled.
2644 std::vector<long> cellFillIds;
2645 for (const adaption::Info &adaptionInfo : adaptionData) {
2646 if (adaptionInfo.entity != adaption::Entity::ENTITY_CELL) {
2647 continue;
2648 }
2649
2650 if (m_narrowBandSize == LEVELSET_NARROW_BAND_UNLIMITED) {
2651 cellFillIds.insert(cellFillIds.end(), adaptionInfo.current.begin(), adaptionInfo.current.end());
2652 } else {
2653 for (long cellId : adaptionInfo.current) {
2654 if (isCellInNarrowBand(cellId)) {
2655 cellFillIds.push_back(cellId);
2656 }
2657 }
2658 }
2659 }
2660
2661 return cellFillIds;
2662}
2663
2672std::vector<long> LevelSetObject::evalCellFullCacheFillIds(LevelSetZone zone) const
2673{
2674 // Early return if the object is empty
2675 if (empty()) {
2676 return std::vector<long>();
2677 }
2678
2679 // Detect the cells to be filled
2680 //
2681 // If the requested zone is the narrow band, it is possible to call the same function used
2682 // for the caches in narrow band mode.
2683 //
2684 // If the requested zone is the bulk, only the functions outside the narrow band should be
2685 // filled. This implies that, if the narrow band size was not not set, no cells should be
2686 // filled.
2687 if (zone == LevelSetZone::NARROW_BAND) {
2688 return evalCellNarrowBandCacheFillIds(zone);
2689 } else {
2690 if (m_narrowBandSize == LEVELSET_NARROW_BAND_UNLIMITED) {
2691 return std::vector<long>();
2692 } else {
2693 // Get mesh information
2694 const VolumeKernel &mesh = *(m_kernel->getMesh()) ;
2695
2696 // Identify cells outside the narrow band
2697 std::vector<long> cellFillIds;
2698 if (const VolCartesian *cartesianMesh = dynamic_cast<const VolCartesian *>(&mesh)) {
2699 long nCells = cartesianMesh->getCellCount();
2700 for (long cellId = 0; cellId < nCells; ++cellId) {
2701 if (!isCellInNarrowBand(cellId)) {
2702 cellFillIds.push_back(cellId);
2703 }
2704 }
2705 } else {
2706 for (const Cell &cell : mesh.getCells()) {
2707 long cellId = cell.getId();
2708 if (!isCellInNarrowBand(cellId)) {
2709 cellFillIds.push_back(cellId);
2710 }
2711 }
2712 }
2713
2714 return cellFillIds;
2715 }
2716 }
2717}
2718
2730std::vector<long> LevelSetObject::evalCellFullCacheFillIds(LevelSetZone zone, const std::vector<adaption::Info> &adaptionData) const
2731{
2732 // Early return if the object is empty
2733 if (empty()) {
2734 return std::vector<long>();
2735 }
2736
2737 // Detect the cells to be filled
2738 //
2739 // If the requested zone is the narrow band, it is possible to call the same function used
2740 // for the caches in narrow band mode.
2741 //
2742 // If the requested zone is the bulk, only the functions outside the narrow band should be
2743 // filled. This implies that, if the narrow band size was not not set, no cells should be
2744 // filled.
2745 if (zone == LevelSetZone::NARROW_BAND) {
2746 return evalCellNarrowBandCacheFillIds(zone);
2747 } else {
2748 if (m_narrowBandSize == LEVELSET_NARROW_BAND_UNLIMITED) {
2749 return std::vector<long>();
2750 } else {
2751 // Identify cells outside the narrow band
2752 std::vector<long> cellFillIds;
2753 for (const adaption::Info &adaptionInfo : adaptionData) {
2754 if (adaptionInfo.entity != adaption::Entity::ENTITY_CELL) {
2755 continue;
2756 }
2757
2758 for (long cellId : adaptionInfo.current) {
2759 if (!isCellInNarrowBand(cellId)) {
2760 cellFillIds.push_back(cellId);
2761 }
2762 }
2763 }
2764
2765 return cellFillIds;
2766 }
2767 }
2768}
2769
2776std::vector<long> LevelSetObject::evalCellCacheStaleIds(const std::vector<adaption::Info> &adaptionData) const
2777{
2778 // Identify cells whose entries should be pruned
2779 //
2780 // We need to prune entries for both cells that have been removed and newly added cells.
2781 // When a new cell is added to the cache, synchronized caches will automatically create
2782 // an entry for the new cell, however the information associated to that entry is not
2783 // initialized and may contain random data. We need to explicitly state that the newly
2784 // added cells are not in the cached yet.
2785 std::vector<long> cellPruneIds;
2786 for (const adaption::Info &adaptionInfo : adaptionData) {
2787 if (adaptionInfo.entity != adaption::Entity::ENTITY_CELL) {
2788 continue;
2789 }
2790
2791 cellPruneIds.insert(cellPruneIds.end(), adaptionInfo.previous.begin(), adaptionInfo.previous.end());
2792 cellPruneIds.insert(cellPruneIds.end(), adaptionInfo.current.begin(), adaptionInfo.current.end());
2793 }
2794
2795 return cellPruneIds;
2796}
2797
2806typename LevelSetObject::CellCacheCollection::Cache * LevelSetObject::getFieldCellCache(LevelSetField field) const
2807{
2808 // Early return if no cache is associated with the field
2809 if (getFieldCellCacheMode(field) == LevelSetCacheMode::NONE) {
2810 return nullptr;
2811 }
2812
2813 // Get field cache
2814 std::size_t cacheId = getFieldCellCacheId(field);
2815
2816 return getCellCache(cacheId);
2817}
2818
2825std::size_t LevelSetObject::getFieldCellCacheId(LevelSetField field) const
2826{
2827 std::size_t fieldIndex = static_cast<std::size_t>(field);
2828
2829 return m_cellFieldCacheIds[fieldIndex];
2830}
2831
2838std::size_t LevelSetObject::createFieldCellCache(LevelSetField field)
2839{
2840 switch(field) {
2841
2842 case LevelSetField::VALUE:
2843 return createFieldCellCache<double>(field);
2844
2845 case LevelSetField::SIGN:
2846 return createFieldCellCache<short>(field);
2847
2848 case LevelSetField::GRADIENT:
2849 return createFieldCellCache<std::array<double, 3>>(field);
2850
2851 default:
2852 throw std::runtime_error("The requested field is not supported!");
2853
2854 }
2855}
2856
2862void LevelSetObject::destroyFieldCellCache(LevelSetField field)
2863{
2864 // Update field properties
2865 std::size_t fieldIndex = static_cast<std::size_t>(field);;
2866 m_cellFieldCacheIds[fieldIndex] = CellCacheCollection::NULL_CACHE_ID;
2867
2868 // Destroy cache
2869 std::size_t cacheId = getFieldCellCacheId(field);
2870 destroyCellCache(cacheId);
2871}
2872
2879void LevelSetObject::fillFieldCellCaches(LevelSetZone zone, const std::vector<LevelSetField> &fields)
2880{
2881 // Early return if there are no caches to update
2882 if (fields.empty()) {
2883 return;
2884 }
2885
2886 // It's more efficient to process the fields grouped by their cache mode
2887 for (std::size_t cacheModeIndex = 0; cacheModeIndex < static_cast<std::size_t>(LevelSetCacheMode::COUNT); ++cacheModeIndex) {
2888 LevelSetCacheMode cacheMode = static_cast<LevelSetCacheMode>(cacheModeIndex);
2889
2890 // Get fields that operate in the processed cache mode
2891 std::vector<LevelSetField> cacheModeFields;
2892 for (LevelSetField field : fields) {
2893 if (getFieldCellCacheMode(field) != cacheMode) {
2894 continue;
2895 }
2896
2897 cacheModeFields.push_back(field);
2898 }
2899
2900 if (cacheModeFields.empty()) {
2901 continue;
2902 }
2903
2904 // Identify the cell ids that should be added to the cache
2905 std::vector<long> cellCacheFillIds = evalCellCacheFillIds(zone, cacheMode);
2906
2907 // Fill the caches
2908 for (LevelSetField field : cacheModeFields) {
2909 fillFieldCellCache(field, cellCacheFillIds);
2910 }
2911 }
2912}
2913
2921void LevelSetObject::fillFieldCellCaches(LevelSetZone zone, const std::vector<LevelSetField> &fields,
2922 const std::vector<adaption::Info> &adaptionData)
2923{
2924 // Early return if there are no caches to update
2925 if (fields.empty()) {
2926 return;
2927 }
2928
2929#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
2930 // Get mesh information
2931 const VolumeKernel &mesh = *(m_kernel->getMesh());
2932
2933 // Check if there are non-volatile caches to process
2934 bool areNonVolatileCacheProcessed = false;
2935 for (LevelSetField field : fields) {
2936 CellCacheCollection::Cache *fieldCache = getFieldCellCache(field);
2937 if (fieldCache && !fieldCache->isVolatile()) {
2938 areNonVolatileCacheProcessed = true;
2939 break;
2940 }
2941 }
2942
2943 // Identify the cells that have been received.
2944 std::unordered_set<long> recievedCellIds;
2945 if (areNonVolatileCacheProcessed) {
2946 if (m_kernel->getMesh()->isPartitioned()) {
2947 for( const adaption::Info &adaptionInfo : adaptionData){
2948 if( adaptionInfo.entity != adaption::Entity::ENTITY_CELL){
2949 continue;
2950 }
2951
2952 switch (adaptionInfo.type) {
2953
2954 case adaption::Type::TYPE_PARTITION_RECV:
2955 recievedCellIds.insert(adaptionInfo.current.begin(), adaptionInfo.current.end());
2956 break;
2957
2958 default:
2959 break;
2960
2961 }
2962 }
2963 }
2964 }
2965#endif
2966
2967 // It's more efficient to process the fields grouped by their cache mode
2968 for (std::size_t cacheModeIndex = 0; cacheModeIndex < static_cast<std::size_t>(LevelSetCacheMode::COUNT); ++cacheModeIndex) {
2969 LevelSetCacheMode cacheMode = static_cast<LevelSetCacheMode>(cacheModeIndex);
2970
2971 // Get fields with caches that operate in the processed mode
2972 std::vector<LevelSetField> cacheModeFields;
2973 for (LevelSetField field : fields) {
2974 if (getFieldCellCacheMode(field) != cacheMode) {
2975 continue;
2976 }
2977
2978 cacheModeFields.push_back(field);
2979 }
2980
2981 if (cacheModeFields.empty()) {
2982 continue;
2983 }
2984
2985 // Identify the cell ids that should be filled for volatile caches
2986 std::vector<long> cellVolatileCacheFillIds = evalCellCacheFillIds(zone, cacheMode, adaptionData);
2987
2988 bool emptyCellVolatileCacheFillIds = cellVolatileCacheFillIds.empty();
2989#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
2990 if (mesh.isPartitioned()) {
2991 MPI_Allreduce(MPI_IN_PLACE, &emptyCellVolatileCacheFillIds, 1, MPI_C_BOOL, MPI_LAND, m_kernel->getCommunicator()) ;
2992 }
2993#endif
2994
2995 if (emptyCellVolatileCacheFillIds) {
2996 continue;
2997 }
2998
2999 // Identify the cell ids that should be filled for non-volatile caches
3000 //
3001 // For non-volatile caches, entries associated with cell received from other processes
3002 // are exchanged when the caches are adapted and there is no need to evaluate them.
3003 std::vector<long> cellNonVolatileCacheFillIds;
3004#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
3005 if (areNonVolatileCacheProcessed && !recievedCellIds.empty()) {
3006 cellNonVolatileCacheFillIds.reserve(cellVolatileCacheFillIds.size());
3007 for (long cellId : cellVolatileCacheFillIds) {
3008 if (recievedCellIds.count(cellId)) {
3009 continue;
3010 }
3011
3012 cellNonVolatileCacheFillIds.push_back(cellId);
3013 }
3014 } else {
3015 cellNonVolatileCacheFillIds = cellVolatileCacheFillIds;
3016 }
3017#else
3018 cellNonVolatileCacheFillIds = cellVolatileCacheFillIds;
3019#endif
3020
3021 // Fill field caches
3022 for (LevelSetField field : cacheModeFields) {
3023 CellCacheCollection::Cache *cache = getFieldCellCache(field);
3024 if (cache->isVolatile()) {
3025 fillFieldCellCache(field, cellVolatileCacheFillIds);
3026 } else {
3027 fillFieldCellCache(field, cellNonVolatileCacheFillIds);
3028 }
3029 }
3030 }
3031}
3032
3039void LevelSetObject::fillFieldCellCache(LevelSetField field, const std::vector<long> &cellIds)
3040{
3041 // Early return if no cache is associated with the field
3042 if (getFieldCellCacheMode(field) == LevelSetCacheMode::NONE) {
3043 return;
3044 }
3045
3046#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
3047 // Get mesh information
3048 const VolumeKernel &mesh = *(m_kernel->getMesh());
3049#endif
3050
3051 // Early return if there are no cells to fill
3052 //
3053 // Even if there are no cells to fill, the cache will now be considered non-empty, in this
3054 // way it will be processed by the functions that update the caches.
3055 bool emptyCellIds = cellIds.empty();
3056#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI==1
3057 if (mesh.isPartitioned()) {
3058 MPI_Allreduce(MPI_IN_PLACE, &emptyCellIds, 1, MPI_C_BOOL, MPI_LAND, m_kernel->getCommunicator()) ;
3059 }
3060#endif
3061
3062 if (emptyCellIds) {
3063 return;
3064 }
3065
3066 // Get list of ghost exchange sources
3067 std::set<long> ghostExchangeSources;
3068 std::set<long> ghostExchangeTargets;
3069#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
3070 for (const auto &entry : mesh.getGhostCellExchangeSources()) {
3071 const std::vector<long> rankSourceList = entry.second;
3072 ghostExchangeSources.insert(rankSourceList.begin(), rankSourceList.end());
3073 }
3074
3075 for (const auto &entry : mesh.getGhostCellExchangeTargets()) {
3076 const std::vector<long> rankTargetList = entry.second;
3077 ghostExchangeTargets.insert(rankTargetList.begin(), rankTargetList.end());
3078 }
3079#endif
3080
3081#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
3082 // Get field cache
3083 std::size_t cacheId = getFieldCellCacheId(field);
3084
3085 // Create data communicator
3086 std::unique_ptr<DataCommunicator> dataCommunicator;
3087 if (mesh.isPartitioned()) {
3088 dataCommunicator = m_kernel->createDataCommunicator();
3089 }
3090
3091 // Fill cache values of cells that are sources for ghost exchange
3092 for (long cellId : cellIds) {
3093 if (ghostExchangeSources.count(cellId) == 0) {
3094 continue;
3095 }
3096
3097 fillFieldCellCache(field, cellId);
3098 }
3099
3100 // Start ghost exchange
3101 if (dataCommunicator) {
3102 startCellCacheExchange(mesh.getGhostCellExchangeSources(), cacheId, dataCommunicator.get());
3103 }
3104#endif
3105
3106 // Fill cache values of internal cells that are not sources for ghost exchange
3107 //
3108 // Values on ghost cells are not evaluated, because those values will be communicated
3109 // by the ghost data exchange.
3110 for (long cellId : cellIds) {
3111 if (ghostExchangeSources.count(cellId) > 0) {
3112 continue;
3113 } else if (ghostExchangeTargets.count(cellId) > 0) {
3114 continue;
3115 }
3116
3117 fillFieldCellCache(field, cellId);
3118 }
3119
3120#if BITPIT_ENABLE_MPI
3121 // Complete ghost exchange
3122 if (dataCommunicator) {
3123 completeCellCacheExchange(mesh.getGhostCellExchangeTargets(), cacheId, dataCommunicator.get());
3124 }
3125#endif
3126}
3127
3134void LevelSetObject::fillFieldCellCache(LevelSetField field, long id)
3135{
3136 // Early return if no cache is associated with the field
3137 if (getFieldCellCacheMode(field) == LevelSetCacheMode::NONE) {
3138 return;
3139 }
3140
3141 // Fill cache
3142 switch (field) {
3143
3144 case LevelSetField::SIGN:
3145 evalCellSign(id);
3146 break;
3147
3148 case LevelSetField::VALUE:
3149 evalCellValue(id, true);
3150 break;
3151
3152 case LevelSetField::GRADIENT:
3153 evalCellGradient(id, true);
3154 break;
3155
3156 default:
3157 throw std::runtime_error("Unsupported field!");
3158
3159 }
3160}
3161
3171typename LevelSetObject::CellCacheCollection::Cache * LevelSetObject::getCellCache(std::size_t cacheId) const
3172{
3173 if (cacheId == CellCacheCollection::NULL_CACHE_ID) {
3174 return nullptr;
3175 }
3176
3177 return (*m_cellCacheCollection)[cacheId].getCache();
3178}
3179
3185void LevelSetObject::destroyCellCache(std::size_t cacheId)
3186{
3187 m_cellCacheCollection->erase(cacheId);
3188}
